definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Lot son of Haran, and nephew of Abram; LXX Lwt;—Ge 11:27, Ge 11:31, Ge 12:4, Ge 12:5, Ge 13:1, Ge 13:5, Ge 13:7, Ge 13:8, Ge 13:10, Ge 13:11, Ge 13:11, Ge 13:12, Ge 13:14, Ge 14:12, Ge 14:16 + 15 t. Ge 19; † [[בְּנֵי לוֹט]] = Moabites De 2:9; = Ammonites De 2:19; = both, Ps 83:9.
